items.sentence: Tom and Mary were wearing matching T-shirts.
How long do you think these boots will last?
I'm lucky that I'm still allowed to do that.
Is it true that Tom tried to commit suicide?
Will you help me translate this into French?
Tom is going to be here every day this week.
If you don't leave, I'll sic my dogs on you.
Tom's dog eats almost anything you give her.
Tom's dog eats almost anything you give him.
Tom wanted to know why Mary didn't love him.
Tom likes to sit on the grass on sunny days.
I want to stay in Australia a little longer.
I intend to stay in Australia with my uncle.
I lived in Australia for almost three years.
I met a woman from Australia this afternoon.
I moved here from Australia three years ago.
I understand you know a lot about Australia.
Tom bought a round-trip ticket to Australia.
Tom and Mary lived in Australia for a while.
Tom thinks he's got a monopoly on the truth.
